body.name: Luckyear Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair-400lbs Big and Tall Heavy Duty, Wide & Soft Sponge Molded Cushion Home Office Desk Chair with Adjustable Seat Height, Executive Computer Task Chair
features: 【400LBS Heavy Duty Office Chair & Easy to Install】The office chair with a heavy-duty, durable base can support up to 400lbs of grown people. A comfortable ergonomic office chair comes with all the hardware and necessary tools. Most people can finish its installation within 15- 20 minutes by following our assembly video or instructions.

【Large & Sponge Molded Cushion Office Chair】This office chair uses a 20.3" wide and 4.8" thick widened and sponge molded cushion. Even if we work for a long time, we can protect and support our hip health at any time. The breathable mesh back promotes good air circulation and keeps you cool even when sitting for long periods of time.

【Breathable Mesh Back】The back of the office chair is made of breathable PE polyester elastic mesh to keep you cool and comfortable. This premium mesh resists wear and deformation and promotes good airflow to keep you cool even after prolonged sitting.

【Extra Comfy and Solid Desk Chair】Heigh resiliency sponge molded cushion and skin-friendly ventilated mesh backrest cover to bring a soft and comfortable sitting experience. Our ergonomic office chair, which base has passed the BIFMA certification, 3-level SGS gas lift certified has excellent durability and bearing capacity. PU mute wheels roll smoothly, with no harm on the wooden floor, and the sturdy five-pointed base and chair frame adds durability and a stylish appearance.

【5 Years Warranty & Excellent Customer Service】The office chair is guaranteed for 5 years. if there is any problem, such as missing parts, product damage, or other unsatisfactory problems, please contact us through the Amazon front desk, and we will reply to you within 24 hours and actively solve them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, Sturdy and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely pleased with this office chair! The seat cushion is so big and incredibly comfortable! It truly makes a significant difference in my working day, spent in a chair for hours at a time. The pump action for adjusting the height of the chair is smooth and problem-free. I like the lumbar support, it is a rigid part of the chair that can be slid up and down depending on where you would prefer to have additional support. The chair wheels and 360-degree swivel are perfect and smooth. Overall, the chair looks good, and I am so impressed by the seat cushion. For the price, it offers great quality, good workmanship, and can be adjusted in various ways, making it suitable for all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and Comfortable Office Chair for Home Workspace
reviews.reviewText: Nicely packaged upon receipt, not to big or heavy, and the kit went together quickly and included all necessary tools and instructions. Black theme works nicely with my other stuff. Chair is quiet (doesn’t squeak) and rolls, pivots, and rocks smoothly. The mesh back keeps everything cool. The size of the butt part is deep enough to sit comfortably. My only wish would be for the padding on the butt part to be a touch thicker. It only ever becomes an issue after about 8-9 hours of constant sitting. Happens from time-to-time, but not enough that it would bother me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this chair for my office, and overall I found this chair to be very comfortable. It was packaged very well. The directions were easy enough to follow therefore I had no trouble assembling this chair. In terms of size and fit it works well in an office setting. It is elegant and stylish. The quality of the material seems pretty good and the armrests are very comfortable. It completely supports my back. It’s a very comfortable chair with a good price. I am very happy that I bought this chair for my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice chair, but a nightmare to assemple alone!
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Seat is comfortable & the seat back is cool. There is an adjustable lumbar support on the seat back. Arm rests are nicely padded, and I really like their fold back feature. They are at a comfortable height for me. The chair rolls smoothly, and the legs are long & distribute the weight of the chair on the floor more evenly.Cons: The seat is too short, and you cannot adjust the depth of the seat back, i.e., move it further back from the seat, to compensate. You cannot lock the tilt feature in place, and the arm rests are fixed & can't be raised or lowered.But assembly is the very worst I've encountered! None of the surfaces readily align, and some of the pieces are heavy (for me), and the large ones are very awkward to handle. I recommend having 2 people do this, with one holding the parts in position. Also, step 3 being particularly difficult for me, I went back and disassembled the parts in step 2. I HIGHLY recommend you do step 3 before step 2, as it makes both easier, esp step 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy assembly comfortable chair for home office
reviews.reviewText: this is a super comfortable chair, straight forward no fuss, you can adjust the height and also move the arm rest down or vertically. i've gone through quote a number of office chairs in my days, and i want to highly the best part of this chair is how easy it is to assemble this. i was able to put the chair together without the manual. please see picture of how organized and well labeled the necessary screws were. overall feel is great, mobility is smooth, and its lighter despite the big size of the chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy quality chair for reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I took a plunge on this chair after seeing the limited number of reviews, however which were all extremely positive. Upon receiving the chair, the seat cushion had slightly misaligned bottom screw holes which made it incredibly difficult to attach to the backrest. After struggling for some time I wasn’t able to get the screws in completely and this resulted in an unsturdy chair. I emailed the seller support and they promptly shipped me a whole new chair box. I only needed the new seat, which worked fine with my existing parts. They also allowed me to send back the rest of the new chair parts and old seat (to minimize eco waste). The final chair setup is very comfortable and seems high quality. I’ve sat it in for many hours daily about a week now and no issues yet. FYI - I found it easier during setup to swap Steps 3 and 2, but YMMV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy and easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: This office chair is a winner. I’ve been working from home a lot and on the hunt for a reasonably priced chair that is comfortable and practical. The cushion and mesh back combo make it a comfy haven for work marathons. It beats my other chair when it comes to comfort, all thanks to its superb cushioning and back support. Plus, it was surprisingly easy to put together. I recommend this chair to anyone working from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible and Comfortable Ergonomic Chair
reviews.reviewText: The ergonomic chair's flexibility is truly impressive, adapting seamlessly to various sitting positions. Its comfort is unparalleled, providing excellent lumbar support and cushioning. A game-changer for those long work hours, promoting a healthier and more enjoyable seated experience. Easy to assemble in 15 mins
